qoute: Cheerfulness and contentment are great beautifiers and are famous preservers of youthful looks.
Contentment consist not in adding more fuel, but in taking away some fire.
Contentment is natural wealth, luxury is artificial poverty.
Contentment is, after all, simply refined indolence.
He is rich who is content with the least; for contentment is the wealth of nature.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
One should either be sad or joyful. Contentment is a warm sty for eaters and sleepers.
Temperance is a tree which as for its root very little contentment, and for its fruit calm and peace.
There is no end of craving. Hence contentment alone is the best way to happiness. Therefore, acquire contentment.
To feel that one has a place in life solves half the problem of contentment.

To feel that one has a place in life solves half the problem of contentment.
To feel that one has a place in life solves half the problems of contentment.
When we cannot find contentment in ourselves, it is useless to seek it elsewhere.
